name: Out of the Breach
description:
Out of the Breach A completely original* tactical puzzle game

* not really

The aliens known as the Hek have destroyed the Earth. What little remained of humanity constructed a new military base, located in a region outside of our space-time, known as the Breach. From there they launch their attacks on the Hek in the past in order to save the future.

Demake JAM entry.

A (bad) demake of Into the Breach. One playable level, three mechs and three enemy unit types.

Software used (poorly):

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • GIMP
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Bfxr

The font used in the game is Endamage SF, created by somepx.itch.io.
